titleStmt.title: The case of the King stated, from the very beginning of the warre to this present day, in relation I. To the two Houses. II. To the Army. III. To the Scots. IV. To the subjects of England in generall. In justification & commiseration of his Majesty in this his distressed condition; and for the satisfaction of the whole kingdom. / By Basilius Anonymus.
titleStmt.author: Basilius Anonymus.

notesStmt.note: The words "I. To the two Houses. .. generall." are bracketed together on title page.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
